snippet: Factory orders rose 1.1 percent in December, and the Institute for Supply Management said employment in the service sector rose.
lead_paragraph: Factory orders rose 1.1 percent in December, and the Institute for Supply Management said employment in the service sector rose.

headline.seo: Factory Orders Rise, and Jobs Increase in Service Industries
headline.main: Factory Orders Jump 1.1% as Businesses Invest in Heavy Machinery
headline.print_headline: Factory Orders Jump 1.1% as Businesses Invest in Heavy Machinery
